thread.title: Red River Rivalry live chat
thread.title_full: Red River Rivalry live chat - San Antonio Express-News

author: Mike Finger
title: Red River Rivalry live chat
text:
Photo: Eric Gay /Associated Press Image 1 of / 18 Caption
Close
Image 1 of 18 Texas head coach Charlie Strong takes the field with his team before an the game against Oklahoma State, Saturday, Sept. 26, 2015, in Austin.
Photo: Eric Gay /Associated Press Texas head coach Charlie Strong takes the field with his team... Image 2 of 18 Texas Longhorns' Kendall Sanders looks for room around Oklahoma Sooners' Dominique Alexander during first half action of the Red River Rivalry held Saturday Oct. 12, 2013 at Cotton Bowl Stadium in Dallas, Tx.
Photo: San Antonio Express-News Texas Longhorns' Kendall Sanders looks for room around Oklahoma... Image 3 of 18 OU defensive tackle Torrea Peterson celebrates with the golden hat after the No. 11 Sooners' 31-26 win over Texas in the Red River Rivalry at the Cotton Bowl.
Photo: Shelby Tauber / Associated Press OU defensive tackle Torrea Peterson celebrates with the golden hat... Image 4 of 18 UT quarterback David Ash fumbles the ball away as he is slammed down by Ronnel Lewis as Texas Longhorns play the Oklahoma Sooners at the Cottom Bowl in the Red River Rivalry October 8, 2011. Tom Reel/Staff
Photo: SAN ANTONIO EXPRESS-NEWS UT quarterback David Ash fumbles the ball away as he is slammed... Image 5 of 18 Oklahoma's Travis Lewis (12) and Tom Wort (21) tackle Texas quarterback David Ash (14) in the second half of the Red River Rivalry at the Cotton Bowl in Dallas on Saturday, Oct. 8, 2011. The Sooners defeated the Longhorns, 55-17. Kin Man Hui/kmhui@express-news.net
Photo: SAN ANTONIO EXPRESS-NEWS Oklahoma's Travis Lewis (12) and Tom Wort (21) tackle Texas... Image 6 of 18 SPORTS David Ash and the Longhorns leave the field in dejection as the Texas Longhorns lose 55-17 to the Oklahoma Sooners at the Cottom Bowl in the Red River Rivalry October 8, 2011. Tom Reel/Staff
Photo: SAN ANTONIO EXPRESS-NEWS SPORTS David Ash and the Longhorns leave the field in dejection as... Image 7 of 18 Oklahoma Sooners' Rashod Favors (10) reacts after a tackle on Texas Longhorns quarterback David Ash in the second half at the Red River Rivalry at the Cotton Bowl in Dallas on Saturday, Oct. 13, 2012. The Sooners defeated the Longhorns 63-21.
Photo: San Antonio Express-News Oklahoma Sooners' Rashod Favors (10) reacts after a tackle on Texas... Image 8 of 18 Texas Longhorns' quarterback David Ash (center) attempts a throw over Oklahoma Sooners' Casey Walker (53) and Corey Nelson (07) in the second half at the Red River Rivalry at the Cotton Bowl in Dallas on Saturday, Oct. 13, 2012. The Sooners defeated the Longhorns 63-21.
Photo: San Antonio Express-News Texas Longhorns' quarterback David Ash (center) attempts a throw... Image 9 of 18 Texas Longhorns quarterback David Ash (14) fumbles the ball while tackled by Oklahoma Sooners' Tom Wort (21) and Tony Jefferson (01) in the second half at the Red River Rivalry at the Cotton Bowl in Dallas on Saturday, Oct. 13, 2012. The Sooners defeated the Longhorns 63-21.
Photo: San Antonio Express-News Texas Longhorns quarterback David Ash (14) fumbles the ball while... Image 10 of 18 Texas Longhorns head coach Mac Brown (right) and quarterback David Ash (left) had difficulty finding a solution against the Oklahoma Sooners in the second half at the Red River Rivalry at the Cotton Bowl in Dallas on Saturday, Oct. 13, 2012. The Sooners defeated the Longhorns 63-21.
Photo: San Antonio Express-News Texas Longhorns head coach Mac Brown (right) and quarterback David... Image 11 of 18 Texas Longhorns quarterback David Ash (14) walks off the field after getting sacked by the Oklahoma Sooners in the second half at the Red River Rivalry at the Cotton Bowl in Dallas on Saturday, Oct. 13, 2012. He eventually left the game for good with an apparent injury. The Sooners defeated the Longhorns 63-21.
Photo: San Antonio Express-News Texas Longhorns quarterback David Ash (14) walks off the field... Image 12 of 18 Oklahoma cornerback Zack Sanchez (15) celebrates scoring a touchdown after intercepting a pass against Texas quarterback Tyrone Swoopes (18) during the first half of an NCAA college football game at the Cotton Bowl, Saturday, Oct. 11, 2014, in Dallas. (AP Photo/LM Otero)
Photo: LM Otero, STF / Associated Press Oklahoma cornerback Zack Sanchez (15) celebrates scoring a... Image 13 of 18 Longhorns quarterback Jerrod Heard dishes forward in the fourth quarter as Texas hosts Oklahoma State at Royal-Memorial Stadium on Sept. 26, 2015.
Photo: Tom Reel /San Antonio Express-News Longhorns quarterback Jerrod Heard dishes forward in the fourth... Image 14 of 18 Longhorns quarterback Jerrod Heard twists away from Ryan Simmons (52) and Seth Jacobs as Texas hosts Oklahoma State at Royal-Memorial Stadium on Sept. 26, 2015.
Photo: Tom Reel /San Antonio Express-News Longhorns quarterback Jerrod Heard twists away from Ryan Simmons... Image 15 of 18 Oklahoma quarterbback Trevor Knight celebrates after a touchdown during an NCAA college football game against Texas, Saturday, Oct. 11, 2014, at the Cotton Bowl in Dallas.
Photo: Shelby Tauber /Associated Press Oklahoma quarterbback Trevor Knight celebrates after a touchdown... Image 16 of 18 Longhorns quarterback Chris Simms is sacked by OU's Corey Heinecke Saturday afternoon Oct. 7, 2000 during the Longhorns' 63-14 loss to Oklahoma during the Red River Shootout at the Cotton Bowl in Dallas. Simms was sacked 3 times during the game and had only 63 yards passing with one interception.
Photo: WILLIAM LUTHER, San Antonio Express-News Longhorns quarterback Chris Simms is sacked by OU's Corey Heinecke... Image 17 of 18
Texas Longhorns cornerback A.J. White (7) is sacked by Oklahoma Sooners linebacker Tom Wort (21) and Oklahoma Sooners defensive end Jeremy Beal (44) during second half NCAA Big 12 "Red River Shootout" football action between the University of Texas and the University of Oklahoma at the Cotton Bowl on Oct. 2, 2010. Oklahoma won 28-20.
Photo: John F. Rhodes, Dallas Morning News Texas Longhorns cornerback A.J. White (7) is sacked by Oklahoma...
Image 18 of 18 Red River Rivalry live chat 1 / 18 Back to Gallery Join Longhorns beat writer Mike Finger Saturday at 10 a.m. as he fields your questions ahead of the 110th edition of the Red River Rivalry.
RELATED: Longhorns QB Heard on teammates: 'I'm gonna get their phones'
You can submit questions through the comments section of the chat below or by tweeting at Mike using @MikeFinger . We'll be taking questions until just before kickoff.
RELATED: UT mascot Bevo dealing with 'life-threatening condition'
Along with the chat, be sure to follow Mike on Twitter, and read him daily in the Express-News and at MySA.com and Express-News.com. Check back following the game for all the coverage you need of this year's Red River Showdown.
mfinger@express-news.net
Twitter: @MikeFinger
